title: 1 bedroom available July 20
posting_body: Midtown Square is a quaint community in Wayne, Michigan.
Close to major highways, shopping and restaurants makes it a great location for anyone in the Metro Detroit area!
You can check availability, prices, see pictures and apply online at <URL>/
Each apartment comes equipped with a stove, refrigerator, dishwasher and central air.
We have washer and dryers in each building!
You can use coins or card for ease!
Our apartments are spacious with large living rooms, lots of windows and tons of closet space!
The primary bedroom in the 2-bedroom apartment has an enormous walk-in closet!
The application fee is $60 per adult and anyone 18 or older must apply and qualify.
We have a ZERO deposit option – lease lock $39 per month instead of an upfront 1-month deposit!
There is a 1-time administrative fee of $150.00 at move in.
Once your application is approved you will be charged a $100 holding deposit – this will be applied to your first month’s rent.
There is a fee of $65.25 per month for gas, water, trash and pest control.
We do require all residents to have liability insurance of at least $100,000 and we recommend personal property renters’ insurance as well.
We do allow up to 2 pets per home under 40lbs each.
There is a one-time $350 nonrefundable pet fee and $25 pet rent per month per pet.
